sentences.sentence: The transient peak voltage of the heterojunctions were observed when the laser was turned on and off, and increased with chopping frequency and showed saturate tendency finally.
sentences.translation: 在激光打开和关闭时，都观测到了异质结光伏信号的瞬态响应峰值，且该峰值随斩波频率不断增大并在频率较大时趋于饱和。

sentences.sentence: Onedimensional carbon nanometer heterojunctions (1DCNHJs) have attracted tremendous interest owing to their distinctive microstructures, properties and potential applications in nanometer devices.
sentences.translation: 碳基一维纳米异质结由于其独特的结构与性能，以及在纳米器件方面的应用前景，得到了广泛的关注和大量的研究。
